# cancel()

**Instance Method**

Cancels a pending request.

## Declaration

```swift
func cancel()
```

## Discussion

After canceling a request, you can call the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKDirections/calculate(completionHandler:)] method again (if you want) to restart the request process.

## Managing the request

- **isCalculating**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a request is in process.
